testcase.name: Navigate_To_Website_And_Add_Fridge_Products_To_Cart
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @run scenario: Navigate to website and add fridge products to cart e given Navigate to the url Login to website ... passed in 5.242s when Enter "fridge samsung" in the search box and click on enter ... passed in 4.362s when Fetch all the options and get whose price is less and ratings are high ... passed in 6.179s when Fetch less cost machine and add it to cart ... passed in 0.001216s when Click on cart button ... passed in 0.6s then verify the item is added to the cart ... passed in 12.59s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Navigate_To_Website_And_Add_Washing_Products_To_Cart
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @run scenario: Navigate to website and add washing products to cart e given Navigate to the url Login to website ... passed in 2.829s when Enter "washing machine LG" in the search box and click on enter ... passed in 8.67s when Fetch all the options and get whose price is less and ratings are high ... passed in 6.25s when Fetch less cost machine and add it to cart ... passed in 0.0008209s when Click on cart button ... passed in 0.5584s then verify the item is added to the cart ... passed in 13.09s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
